excerpt: I’ve rounded up today’s best gaming deals, from powerful RTX 5080 laptops to ultra-fast OLED monitors.

Add in a 2TB SSD and it boots and loads faster than you'd expect at this price. This 14-inch OMEN gaming laptop is the kind of powerhouse that’s ready for high-end gaming and creative work alike. That 3K OLED screen is a beauty, and with 32GB RAM and an RTX 5060, it handles everything from editing to AAA games without breaking a sweat. This ProArt PX13 is a creative studio in disguise. With a 3K OLED touchscreen, RTX 4050 graphics, and Ryzen AI 9 inside, it’s tailored for photo, video, and design work. The build is tough, the display is gorgeous, and it’s loaded with I/O so you don’t have to fuss with dongles. This HP Victus keeps gaming fast and fluid with a 144Hz display and RTX 3050 graphics. The Intel i5 chip and 512GB SSD make it feel quick and responsive for work and play, and the price right now makes it an easy choice for anyone who wants reliable gaming on a budget. The OMEN MAX 16t packs in serious firepower for top-tier gaming and content creation. With an Intel Ultra 7 chip and RTX 5080 GPU, it’s ready for whatever you throw at it. The 2K screen, per-key RGB keyboard, and premium build round it out nicely, especially with a $600 discount.
